Ingredients.2: 1 (12 ounce) package vegetarian ground beef crumbles

Ingredients.3: 0.75 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.8: 3 cups frozen bite-sized potato nuggets (such as Tater Tots®)

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.2: Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Add meatless crumbles and cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in condensed soup, onion, pepper, Italian seasoning, and salt. Transfer mixture to a 8-inch square baking pan. Top with potato nuggets and Cheddar cheese.

Directions.3: Bake in the preheated oven until potato nuggets are golden brown and cheese is melted, about 45 minutes.
